510449247737905152.text: Ready to continue this journey with the #Ukrainian people. My statement following meeting w/ President #Poroshenko.  http://t.co/5Ut2vNF0yE

510420763657388033.text: Our message is clear. We stand by #Ukraine's sovereign choices. And stand by #Ukraine's #European path. Not a threat to no one.

510420308617330688.text: The number of displaced people in eastern #Ukraine has more than doubled during the past 3 weeks. Y'day @EU_Commission mobilised €22mn aid.

510419613969305601.text: We do not hesitate to decisively respond to #Russia's unacceptable behaviour. We have stepped up pressure by deepening restrictive measures.

510419153078198272.text: We have full confidence in President's #Poroshenko efforts. We call on the #Russian side to show the same commitment to peace.

510419023507771392.text: This is our primary goal and concern. There is no military solution for this conflict.

510418932482969600.text: We have discussed how to best achieve progress with a sustainable political solution to the conflict.

510418659568013312.text: #Situation in Ukraine remains very fragile. Ceasefire is a positive step. However it is still insufficient to guarantee sustainable #peace.

510418232034197505.text: This visit to #Kiev means a lot to me. It is a symbol of Europe's support to #Ukraine's sovereignty and unity.

398883094125490176.text: Read the full text of my #Churchill lecture at Zurich University: http://t.co/uEgSzFyFFg

398876745958707200.text: At the University of Zurich during the Churchill Lecture 2013 @uzh_news_en @uzh_news http://t.co/smAyAkhE2G

398873435943612416.text: Decisions we make today will determine for many years whether #Europe remains an area of stability, shared prosperity and #freedom.

398873227461554176.text: Not everything needs a solution at European level and we need to take extra care of the quantity and quality of our regulation.

398872749415747584.text: This deeper Union does not mean more centralization. It means that we should better concentrate EU action on the real issues that matter.

398872357529321473.text: Pro-#European forces need to take the lead & not leave the initiative in the hands of the doomsayers & false prophets. Leadership matters.

398871749619499008.text: The fish is sometimes the last one to understand that it is living in the water!

398871425504645121.text: The European values and way of life are also defended by others like Switzerland as a proud member of the democratic European family.

398870908628000768.text: In the age of globalisation, sovereignty pooled means power gained - for every member of the European Union, and not power lost.

398870233735114752.text: Enlargement is a geostrategic project of first order, about extending our Union's impact and influence – in our very own interest.

398867717827997698.text: The euro is one of our most significant achievements, the most visible symbol of European economic and political integration.

398867488500236288.text: This success story shows that individual interests are better protected by acting together through common institutions.

398867262284640256.text: Europe is and remains an economic giant.

398867030159290368.text: We will not rest on these laurels. We will not pull up the drawbridges.

398866291768819712.text: On 19 September 1946, here in #Zurich, #Churchill put forward his "astonishing" proposal for "a kind of United States of Europe".

398865610764869632.text: #Churchill was a man of foresight with an acute sense of history, often ahead of prevailing opinion.

398865340219670529.text: Since 1945, we #Europeans have made war between ourselves unthinkable. #Churchill helped lay the foundations for this.

398855852108431360.text: Watch live: #Churchill lecture at #Zurich University from 18.15 onwards: http://t.co/hCk2GuXu6V @uzh_news #UZH

398849052873609216.text: Arrived in Zurich this afternoon to deliver the #Churchill Lecture 2013 at the University of Zurich @uzh_news_en #UZH

398046754005741568.text: Read my First Frankfurt speech on Europe including expectations towards Germany: http://t.co/98qPdEZal5

397799317953859585.text: In a globalised world, sovereignty pooled means power gained for every member of the EU, not power lost.

397798429705138176.text: I know very well that all main political forces in Germany have that commitment to Europe. My message to you is simple: Keep it.

397797618895831040.text: Moving towards political union, step by step, starting with completion of banking union. Germany has an imminently crucial role in this.

397796061961814016.text: But Germany could do more to enable others to bring in their respective assets, e.g. through free and unhindered access to service markets.

397795689490837504.text: When we talk about the rebalancing  we are not talking about weakening the competitiveness of the German economy.

397793684768690176.text: The passimg from the D-Mark to the Euro is the most concrete symbol of German and European unification being the two sides of the same coin.

397792678043471872.text: The Euro greatly benefits German companies and jobs. Germany profited the most from a virtuous circle triggered by the Euro.

397791425322303488.text: Germany under the leadership of Chancellor Merkel has shown this political will.

397791311581159424.text: The determination of Germany to stick to the Euro was a decisive factor.

397790699737075712.text: This crisis is a political stress test. The real question is about the political will of #Europeans to solve this crisis together.

397788848417431552.text: Europe today has a continental scale that counts. We need to keep a sense of perspective.

397786886166822912.text: #Europe is above all and fundamentally a community of values.

346607739755175937.text: I'm confident this #G8 will provide political impetus for global change towards more global fairness, including for the poorest countries.

346607611304624128.text: We are convinced that there is a need to improve tax governance everywhere. #G8

346607527863140353.text: We've proposed a maximum extension of the scope for the automatic exchange of information among #EU tax authorities. #G8

346607414881173505.text: Bank secrecy and tax havens will soon belong to the past. #G8

346607300766732288.text: In Europe and at global level, we want that everybody pays his fair share of taxes in a transparent way. #G8

346607238531670016.text: Our bilateral trade agreements are stepping stone towards further liberalising global trade+strengthening multilateral trading system.#G8

346606948331966464.text: #EU is driving force behind the new political momentum in the fight against tax evasion and avoidance. #G8

346606524120043521.text: #EU is world’s largest donor for development assistance, with a specific emphasis on food security. #G8

346606449029431298.text: #EU passed legislation to further open up public data because we believe that open data means opening business opportunities+creating jobs.

346606419375714304.text: #EU has agreed far-reaching binding legislation for transparency in extractive industries and forestry.#G8

346605905061769216.text: #EU has very good story to tell, often pioneering the global agenda in all of the #G8 priorities.

346605768906260481.text: Thirdly, we want fairness through greater transparency on land governance, open data and in extractive industries. #G8

346605716917866496.text: I expect this #G8 to give powerful signal we're ready to look for those who do not respect rules of the game+hold them accountable.

346605622613143553.text: This summit is also about fairness in the way taxes are paid by individuals and companies. #G8

326741007104352258.text: My speech at the launch of the New Narrative for #Europe @BOZARbrussels now available http://t.co/EVoeIYPast

326718938782261248.text: Europe needs your talent to tell our story, to perpetuate our collective memory and to articulate this destiny which we all share.

326718799300669440.text: We won’t have real unity until we acknowledge a sense of shared European destiny which we are ready to work together to achieve.

326718200467320832.text: The European Union is fundamentally a political and cultural project based on strong humanist values.

326717682026156032.text: Culture is a core value and a strong unifying element in European integration.

326717530532098048.text: Europe is a daily reality for more than 500 million Europeans and yet the public opinion is fragmented mainly along national borders.

326717136502419456.text: Europe must now find a fresh impetus in a new rapprochement, the coming together between the people of Europe and the European Union.

326716949952348160.text: The resurgence of populism and nationalism threatens to destroy the dream made real. The indifference of many pro-Europeans is also a risk.

326687705461317632.text: At 5pm attending the launch of the New Narrative for #Europe @BOZARbrussels. Watch live @EbS_News.

326246974678515712.text: The real risk of fragmentation comes from not hearing citizens' concerns, and the real stress test is the threat of polarisation.

326245110708842496.text: When needs, expectations and demands are federalised, so to speak, institutions are bound to follow.

326244092285685760.text: This division of power between the central level and the component states is never set in stone and will always be disputed.

326242517412630529.text: Federalism is in itself a concept with two faces: searching for unity whilst recognising, respecting and reconciling genuine autonomy .
